page.title: 04LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: There is an uneven distribution of leisure facilities in the area.Most of these are concentrated around Chasetown High Street,while other areas have very few facilities.The recreation centre is also situated in the High Street. The centre has a range of facilities including swimming baths,squash courts sports hall and a floodlit astroturf pitch.About 100,000 people a year use the centre coming mainly from local areas. The other major sports facility is Chasewater Leisure Park.This is a major watersports centre.The main activities here are sailing,windsurfing,power boat racing and waterskiing.Major national and international power boat races have been staged there. The area also has many public houses and working mens clubs and facilities for younger and much older people.
